attributes.action: HMS Gannet search and rescue Prestwick
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I petition the UK Government to stop the move to take HMS Gannet from it's base in Prestwick and move it to Glasgow. If it's allowed to happen lots of local jobs will Disappear. So I call on the local population of the Area to sign this petition and try and save HMS Gannet from being moved away from Prestwick.

rejection.details:
Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.


At the moment your petition reads "We petition the Prime Minister to: HMS Gannet search and rescue Prestwick"
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
